Detailed Description

Introduction

Overview

The USB audio module provides a set of API’s that allow user Applications to integrate support for the USB Audio Class. The USB audio module takes care of the communication between USB and the audio device. USB isochronous end points are used for communicating with the host machine. Audio Class module implements interrupt mode of transfer for sending and receiving data from the end points.

References

USB Specification Ver 2.0 Universal Serial Bus Device Class Definition for Audio Devices Ver 1.0
